name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in advanced front-end technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to create high-performance applications. Proven track record in utilizing AI frameworks, including **OpenAI** and **Hugging Face**, with hands-on experience in integrating **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and **React Three Fiber** for immersive, interactive interfaces. Proficient in UI/UX design using tools like **Figma** and **Tailwind** to develop aesthetically pleasing and responsive designs.

Skilled in working with modern testing frameworks such as **Cypress**, **Playwright**, and **Vitest**, ensuring top-quality deliverables. I leverage **REST** and **GraphQL** for efficient data management and real-time applications, and I excel in implementing **WebSocket** for dynamic client-server communication.

Complementing my technical prowess, I bring a robust background in full-stack development using **Node.js** and **Python**, along with a strong foundation in **Docker** for containerization. My experience includes effectively leading projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, emphasizing compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am passionate about building innovative solutions that harness the power of AI/ML for improved functionality and user experience.
